Navigate to the challenge URL and extract the parameter 'galerie' from the URL query string.
Navigate to the challenge URL followed by the parameter of 'galerie' to view a folder beginning with '86hv'.
Inspect the element to view the full folder name.
Navigate to the challenge URL followed by the full folder name to view a file 'password.txt'.
Right click to view the source code, then click the 'password.txt' hyperlink to obtain the password.
